need_scotch_tape.name: You
sentences: I still don’t have the Scotch tape, we need to find it first!

quest_already_done.name: You
sentences: I already fixed the picture, I don’t have anything to fix...
We need to find what the meaning of that image.

quest_not_exist.name: You
sentences: I think we don't need to use this working bench...

questioned_picture.name: Companion
sentences: Photos like that don’t just show the past here. They pull it closer. Careful what you rebuild.

questioned_picture.name: You
sentences: You check the back of the picture showing the Riddle hidden to it...
I know this riddle, but I can't remember.
I think we should go to the Mirror District,
So we can get more clue about this.
What passage we will use? Collapsed Alley or Different path?

options.text: Let's go to the Collapse Alley
options.full_text: Head toward the Collapse Alley way
